medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain and fevers
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient started having nausea with mild right lower quadrant pain 2.5 days ago, which significantly worsened yesterday. Symptoms were accompanied by fever to 39C, vomiting, diarrhea, increased urinary frequency, and anorexia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: MCA ischemic stroke with expressive aphasia, atrial fibrillation s/p ablation and pacemaker on Coumadin, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, lung cancer s/p right upper lobe lobectomy and lymph node dissection, partial left nephrectomy.
